columns.name: id
columns.description: ID of the inventory result entity.

columns.name: type_name
columns.description: The type of inventory item returned by the request.

columns.name: capture_time
columns.description: The time that inventory information was collected for the managed node(s).

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The inventory schema version used by the managed node(s).

columns.name: content
columns.description: Contains all the inventory data of the item type. Results include attribute names and values.

columns.name: schema
columns.description: The inventory item schema definition. Users can use this to compose inventory query filters.
